io.github.olyutorskii.jarabradix

Class ArabicEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.olyutorskii.jarabradix.ArabicEncoder

  • public final class ArabicEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert integer value to Arabic-decimal character sequence.

    It's similar to Integer.toString(int) but, GC-friendly.

    char buffer grows towards a younger index.

    See Also:
    Division by a constant (Wikipedia)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MINLEN_INT
      Required char-array length to convert any int value.
      static int MINLEN_LONG
      Required char-array length to convert any long value.

    • Method Detail

      • int2Arabic

        public static int int2Arabic(int iVal,
                             char[] cbuf)
                      throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Convert int value to Arabic-decimal sequence.

        Result will be aligned to the last array position.

        Parameters:
        iVal - int value
        cbuf - char buffer array output
        Returns:
        stored digits sequence (and sign) length
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - too small array
        See Also:
        Integer.toString(int)

      • int2Arabic

        public static int int2Arabic(int iVal,
                             char[] cbuf,
                             int lastPos)
                      throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Convert int value to Arabic-decimal sequence.

        Result will be aligned to the specified tail position.

        Parameters:
        iVal - int value
        cbuf - char buffer array output
        lastPos - index of tail position in array
        Returns:
        stored digits sequence (and sign) length
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - invalid position
        See Also:
        Integer.toString(int)

      • long2Arabic

        public static int long2Arabic(long lVal,
                              char[] cbuf)
                       throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Convert long value to Arabic-decimal sequence.

        Result will be aligned to the last array position.

        Parameters:
        lVal - long value
        cbuf - char buffer array output
        Returns:
        stored digits sequence (and sign) length
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - too small array
        See Also:
        Long.toString(long)

      • long2Arabic

        public static int long2Arabic(long lVal,
                              char[] cbuf,
                              int lastPos)
                       throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Convert long value to Arabic-decimal sequence.

        Result will be aligned to the specified tail position.

        Parameters:
        lVal - long value
        cbuf - char buffer array output
        lastPos - index of tail position in array
        Returns:
        stored digits sequence (and sign) length
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - invalid position
        See Also:
